attributes.action: Make a criminal offence of Electoral Fraud
attributes.background: During the referendum campaign both sides relied heavily on lies , misinformation and scaremongering. This proposal would make it an offence to use lies and misinformation in an election campaign. It would also apply retroactively to assurances given to the electorate that were then reneged upon.

rejection.details:
Electoral fraud is already illegal. You can find out more about electoral fraud here:

http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/find-information-by-subject/electoral-fraud/preventing-and-reporting-electoral-fraud

You could start a new petition calling clearly for a specific change to the law.
